â€œThis hybrid is very much Sativa forward. That said, it's a lot easier to dose than most Sativa's, and I'm very sensitive to them. The aroma is really good. 

I'd say this is up there for strains that provide me with functional energy and focus. It's very upbeat" without being overwhelming.  I could see this strain being a problem for people who can't help dwelling on negative experiences.â€"
